patterns.name: Google Generative AI Setup
patterns.description: Basic setup for Google's Generative AI SDK
patterns.usage: Use this pattern to initialize the model and client.
patterns.code:
import google.generativeai as genai
import os

genai.configure(api_key=os.environ['GOOGLE_API_KEY'])
model = genai.GenerativeModel('gemini-1.5-flash')

patterns.name: Structured Output with Pydantic
patterns.description: Enforce strict JSON output using Pydantic models with Gemini
patterns.usage: Use whenever an agent needs to return structured data.
patterns.code:
import google.generativeai as genai
from pydantic import BaseModel

class Recipe(BaseModel):
    recipe_name: str
    ingredients: list[str]

model = genai.GenerativeModel('gemini-1.5-flash', generation_config={'response_mime_type': 'application/json', 'response_schema': Recipe})
response = model.generate_content('Cookie recipe')
print(response.text)

patterns.name: Safety Settings
patterns.description: Configure safety filters for Gemini models
patterns.usage: Apply to all agent initializations to ensure A4 (Non-Harm) compliance.

patterns.name: System Instructions
patterns.usage: Use to inject Core Axioms and Agent Purpose.
patterns.code:
model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    'gemini-1.5-flash',
    system_instruction='You are a helpful AI assistant. You must follow these axioms...'
)

patterns.name: Tool Use (Function Calling)
patterns.description: Register Python functions as tools for Gemini
patterns.usage: Use when agent needs to perform actions or retrieve data.
patterns.code:
def add(a: int, b: int) -> int:
    return a + b

model = genai.GenerativeModel(tools=[add])
chat = model.start_chat(enable_automatic_function_calling=True)
